question: Can I manage my Shopify store myself after it's built?
answer:
Yes, Shopify has a fairly simple to use dashboard that allows you customize your store without our developers needing to help out.

You can control everything from what products you want to sell to your end user experience.

We also offer a tutorial session at the end of building your project to show you the ins and outs of Shopify to make sure youâ€™re ready to go!
